issues.description: The problem statement uses the standard abbreviation "RGB" (Rot/Grün/Blau) to refer to the color value, while the user-facing prompt string in both the template and the solution files mistakenly uses "RBG". This is a cross-artifact naming/term mismatch for the same conceptual entity (the color value) and can cause brief confusion for students when they read the exercise and the prompt text or enter the color value.
issues.suggested_fix: Correct the prompt text in the template and solution from "Bitte RBG-Wert für neue Farbe eingeben" to "Bitte RGB-Wert für neue Farbe eingeben" (i.e., replace "RBG" with the standard "RGB") so the wording matches the problem statement and common terminology.
